desc: Level-up the quality of your social media content with the Hyte stand - your studio on-the-go! Hyte combines LED lighting with a portable, sturdy and easy-to-use phone stand for all your content creation needs!

layout.text: DISCOVER THE SMARTEST CONTENT CREATION TOOL

From creating amazing content to hands-free video calls, the Hyte stand can do it all! With an in-built LED light ands lots of lighting options to choose from, it's a studio on-the-go. Create content from any angle - the Hyte stand has 360° rotation.
